description: Predicts the average travel duration in milliseconds of a path defined by a source and a target stage. It returns the estimated average duration of the shortest path in milliseconds. The duration is -1 if the stages are not found or unreachable. It returns a reference to a message that contains the following properties: sourcestage, targetstage, path (stringified JSON array), duration.

properties.name: sourcestage
properties.label: Source Stage
properties.description: Specify the name of the source stage of the path.

properties.name: targetstage
properties.label: Target Stage
properties.description: Specify the name of the target stage of the path.
